text: If i could have i would have not given any stars. Usually i would give 5 stars because its always good but when they are 12 minutes late and my pizz is not even hot when they get here then when i call to tell them about my pizza they answer and then hangup. Very disappointed

name: Northern Texas
text: These prices have skyrocketed over the last year. Mediocre pizza at best!! Not worth the money! While all of us are struggling to get by with this lockdown Pizza Hut continues to raise prices and ‚Äúdeals‚Äù. We‚Äôll be eating less pizza in the future.

text: I will not return. O tried calling them for 30 minutes because I live 30 minutes away. No one answered the phone. I went inside when I got there to order. Nobody would come out to take my order. They did not acknowledge that I was even ‚Ä¶More

name: Lyn Hinds
text: This Pizza Hut in Glen Rose is always very helpful and friendly. The staff is always busy and the pizzas are always hot and ready when we go to get them. They are 99.9 % of the time correct on what we order, but nobody is perfect.

name: Scott Fargo
text: Ordered a pizza and payed extra for a shaker of cheese. It did not get the cheese. Tried to call them back and they did not answer the phone.

name: Brandi Burgess
text: Even though they ran out of almost everything I ordered, the staff was accommodating and made sure I was 100% satisfied before I left. (Fyi they had been slammed and were super busy)

name: Thatswhatiddoforaklondikebar OWO
text: Awful service and always having trouble with there website! When you call the store they give you some website to go to instead of  accommodating their customers at all! Putting me on hold for 5 mins to give me an email address to complain ‚Ä¶More

text: I will never return here again. I made an order, was told it would be 30 to 45 minutes, arrive 40 minutes later and told that they didnt have the crust I ordered, that they hadn't even started it! Unbelievable! If I could give 0 stars I would.

text: This is at the pizza Hut in Glen Rose Tx I ordered a  large supreme pizza last week carry out for $11.90 it's on my bank statement today I placed same ordered that cost me 19.40 also carry out.  I placed the order online which mentioned ‚Ä¶More

name: Stacy Rhodes
text: The  Manager is a real good person and she is sweet. When I go into  order my pizza and she is there my pizza is always right! But, when I order online it's always little burnt and the crust isn't right! We eat their when we want pizza. It's much better then  Simple Simon's.

text: Pizza was hot and Delicious made as ordered

name: Daniel Upchurch
text: Ordered at 6:47pm. It's 8:34pm. Still no delivery. I called the restaurant and was told they can't get in touch with the delivery driver, but he'll deliver it as soon as he gets back (not even an apology). It's a good thing I like cold pizza. Unfortunately, my wife doesn't. But we have a microwave. So it's ok.

text: Staff is extremely rude and the times they give you are never right. Was told 15 min. Arrived and waited another 35. Way to make Glen Rose look like a joke!!
